metadata.title: CVE-2018-16062 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
dwarf_getaranges in dwarf_getaranges.c in libdw in elfutils before2018-08-18 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-basedbuffer over-read) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16062` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libasm1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libdw1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
libelf1 - 0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.170-0.4ubuntu0.1').
